name: ORS Check and Print Cell Usage
description:
This report allows the end user to view how many prisoners are housed in a prison. It shows the count of prisoners by all respective hierarchical levels (e.g. Block, Wing, Floor, Cell).
ACC0001 - v00.00.06 Last Modified: 29/09/08

dataset.name: Check and Print Cell usage
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.DESCRIPTION, CASE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.HOUSING_LEV_4_CODE IS NULL AND NOT AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.HOUSING_LEV_3_CODE IS NULL AND NOT AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.HOUSING_LEV_2_CODE IS NULL AND NOT AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.HOUSING_LEV_1_CODE IS NULL THEN 'Type 1' WHEN AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.HOUSING_LEV_4_CODE IS NULL AND NOT AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.HOUSING_LEV_3_CODE IS NULL AND NOT AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.HOUSING_LEV_2_CODE IS NULL AND NOT AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.HOUSING_LEV_1_CODE IS NULL THEN 'Type 2' WHEN AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.HOUSING_LEV_4_CODE IS NULL AND AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.HOUSING_LEV_3_CODE IS NULL AND NOT AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.HOUSING_LEV_2_CODE IS NULL AND NOT AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.HOUSING_LEV_1_CODE IS NULL THEN 'Type 3' WHEN AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.HOUSING_LEV_4_CODE IS NULL AND AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.HOUSING_LEV_3_CODE IS NULL AND AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.HOUSING_LEV_2_CODE IS NULL AND NOT AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.HOUSING_LEV_1_CODE IS NULL THEN 'Type 4' ELSE 'Unknown Structure' END AS ESTABLISHMENT_STRUCTURE_TYPE, AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.HOUSING_LEV_1_CODE, CASE WHEN INSTR(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION, '-', 1, 1) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUBSTR(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION, INSTR(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION, '-', 1, 1) + 1, CASE WHEN INSTR(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION, '-', 1, 2) = 0 THEN LENGTH(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION) ELSE INSTR(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION, '-', 1, 2) - INSTR(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION, '-', 1, 1) END - 1) END AS UNIT_CODE_1, AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.HOUSING_LEV_2_CODE, CASE WHEN INSTR(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION, '-', 1, 2) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUBSTR(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION, INSTR(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION, '-', 1, 2) + 1, CASE WHEN INSTR(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION, '-', 1, 3) = 0 THEN LENGTH(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION) ELSE INSTR(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION, '-', 1, 3) - INSTR(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION, '-', 1, 2) END - 1) END AS UNIT_CODE_2, AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.HOUSING_LEV_3_CODE, CASE WHEN INSTR(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION, '-', 1, 3) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUBSTR(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION, INSTR(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION, '-', 1, 3) + 1, CASE WHEN INSTR(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION, '-', 1, 4) = 0 THEN LENGTH(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION) ELSE INSTR(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION, '-', 1, 4) - INSTR(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION, '-', 1, 3) END - 1) END AS UNIT_CODE_3, COUNT(DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY) AS COUNT_NOMS_NUMBER FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATIONS AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_ID = AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.INTERNAL_LOCATION_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER('SSTOW')) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT.AGY_LOC_ID = WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY.CASELOAD_ID) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER('SSTOW')) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER('SSTOW')) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER('SSTOW')) AND (WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY.USERNAME = UPPER('SSTOW')) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER('SSTOW')) AND (WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY.USERNAME = UPPER('SSTOW')) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER('SSTOW')) AND (WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY.USERNAME = UPPER('SSTOW')) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.IN_OUT_STATUS = 'IN' AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_))) GROUP BY AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.DESCRIPTION, CASE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.HOUSING_LEV_4_CODE IS NULL AND NOT AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.HOUSING_LEV_3_CODE IS NULL AND NOT AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.HOUSING_LEV_2_CODE IS NULL AND NOT AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.HOUSING_LEV_1_CODE IS NULL THEN 'Type 1' WHEN AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.HOUSING_LEV_4_CODE IS NULL AND NOT AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.HOUSING_LEV_3_CODE IS NULL AND NOT AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.HOUSING_LEV_2_CODE IS NULL AND NOT AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.HOUSING_LEV_1_CODE IS NULL THEN 'Type 2' WHEN AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.HOUSING_LEV_4_CODE IS NULL AND AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.HOUSING_LEV_3_CODE IS NULL AND NOT AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.HOUSING_LEV_2_CODE IS NULL AND NOT AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.HOUSING_LEV_1_CODE IS NULL THEN 'Type 3' WHEN AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.HOUSING_LEV_4_CODE IS NULL AND AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.HOUSING_LEV_3_CODE IS NULL AND AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.HOUSING_LEV_2_CODE IS NULL AND NOT AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.HOUSING_LEV_1_CODE IS NULL THEN 'Type 4' ELSE 'Unknown Structure' END, AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.HOUSING_LEV_1_CODE, CASE WHEN INSTR(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION, '-', 1, 1) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUBSTR(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION, INSTR(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION, '-', 1, 1) + 1, CASE WHEN INSTR(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION, '-', 1, 2) = 0 THEN LENGTH(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION) ELSE INSTR(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION, '-', 1, 2) - INSTR(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION, '-', 1, 1) END - 1) END, AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.HOUSING_LEV_2_CODE, CASE WHEN INSTR(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION, '-', 1, 2) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUBSTR(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION, INSTR(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION, '-', 1, 2) + 1, CASE WHEN INSTR(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION, '-', 1, 3) = 0 THEN LENGTH(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION) ELSE INSTR(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION, '-', 1, 3) - INSTR(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION, '-', 1, 2) END - 1) END, AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.HOUSING_LEV_3_CODE, CASE WHEN INSTR(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION, '-', 1, 3) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUBSTR(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION, INSTR(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION, '-', 1, 3) + 1, CASE WHEN INSTR(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION, '-', 1, 4) = 0 THEN LENGTH(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION) ELSE INSTR(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION, '-', 1, 4) - INSTR(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION, '-', 1, 3) END - 1) END), dataset_ AS (SELECT DESCRIPTION, ESTABLISHMENT_STRUCTURE_TYPE, HOUSING_LEV_1_CODE, UNIT_CODE_1, HOUSING_LEV_2_CODE, UNIT_CODE_2, HOUSING_LEV_3_CODE, UNIT_CODE_3, COUNT_NOMS_NUMBER, CASE WHEN UNIT_CODE_1 = 'RECP' THEN 'N/A' ELSE CASE WHEN ESTABLISHMENT_STRUCTURE_TYPE = 'Type 1' THEN UNIT_CODE_3 ELSE '-' END END AS V_UNIT_CODE_3, CASE WHEN ESTABLISHMENT_STRUCTURE_TYPE = 'Type 4' THEN '-' ELSE UNIT_CODE_1 END AS V_UNIT_CODE_1, CASE WHEN ESTABLISHMENT_STRUCTURE_TYPE = 'Type 4' THEN 'No Level 1' ELSE HOUSING_LEV_1_CODE END AS V_HOUSING_LEV_1_CODE FROM dataset_base_)

field.name: $ref:V_HOUSING_LEV_3_CODE
field.legacySql: =If([Establishment Structure Type] InList("Type 2";"Type 3"; "Type 4");"No Level 3";[Housing Lev 3 Code])

field.name: $ref:V_UNIT_CODE_2
field.legacySql: =If([Establishment Structure Type] InList("Type 3";"Type 4") Or [Unit Code 1]="RECP";"-";[Unit Code 2])

field.name: $ref:V_HOUSING_LEV_2_CODE
field.legacySql: =If([Establishment Structure Type] InList("Type 3";"Type 4");"No Level 2";[Housing Lev 2 Code])
